body: Hi Ante, You can change the font in line 83. Current font is 'Veranda'. Radiation values are in kWh/m2 (for annual analysis) and Wh/m2 for hourly studies. In both case you need to multiply the numbers with the area of mesh faces if you want to find the totalRadiation. This is exactly what I do inside the component. Here is an old example: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/VMB94olbxS3*2ZczWq1C3cFYvLo0M9Ji0QHQndoQugqnULJaD5y7kbXhDcj9U2RuLxA6Dx2D3fxyUDEHWWfheZ2ny8JN-o7S/totalRadiation.jpg)
